Book Angular App

Id Title Author Description Rate DateStart DateRead
{{ book.id }} {{ book.title }} {{ book.author }} {{ book.description }}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { BookDataService } from './Services/book-data.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html' }) export class AppComponent { title = 'app'; books: any; constructor(private bookData: BookDataService) { this.bookData.getBooks().subscribe((data) => { this.books = data; }) } }
